title: Crispy duck and sesame leafy salad
ingredients: ['1 (610g) pack half aromatic crispy duck (including 12 pancakes and hoisin sauce sachet)', '3 teaspoons toasted sesame oil', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (180g) pack Bistro Salad', '1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds']
